attributes.action: Abolish the TV licence and the BBC!
attributes.additional_details: With recent scandals concerning the accuracy of the BBC broadcasting and its intellectual integrity, we believe it is time for the TV licence and more specifically our national broadcaster to be abolished.
attributes.background:
We believe the BBC is unfit for purpose.
We believe it is time that the British people no longer had to pay for a broadcaster that has been proven to be institutionally biased.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Scrap the BBC TV Licence & replace funding with adverts or paywall
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727365
